original_text: David and all the Israelites were celebrating with all their might before God, with songs and with harps, lyres, timbrels, cymbals and trumpets.
korean_text: 다윗과 이스라엘 온 무리는 하나님 앞에서 힘을 다하여 뛰놀며 노래하며 수금과 비파와 소고와 제금과 나팔로 연주하니라

sentences.original_text: were celebrating with all their might
and with harps, lyres, timbrels, cymbals and trumpets
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 수금, 비파, 소고, 제금, 나팔과 함께
